title: Electives help for 5th sem CSE
content:
These are the list of electives for this year:  
**Elective-I List**

* UE23CS342AA1: Advanced Algorithms
* UE23CS342AA2: Data Analytics
* UE23CS342AA3: Internet of Things
* UE23CS342AA4: Applied Cryptography
* UE23CS342AA5: Virtual and Augmented Reality
* UE23CS342AA6: Human Computer Interaction
* UE23CS342AA7: Topics in Wireless and 5G Networks
* UE23CS342AA8: Bio Inspired Computing
* UE23CS342AA9: Enterprise Business System
* UE23CS342AA10: Quantum Computing

# Elective-II List

* UE23CS343AB1: Image Processing
* UE23CS343AB2: Big Data
* UE23CS343AB3: Graph Theory and its Applications
* UE23CS343AB4: Realtime Operating System
* UE23CS343AB5: Advanced Computer Network
* UE23CS343AB6: Computer Network Security
* UE23CS343AB7: ROS for Autonomous Systems
* UE23CS343AB8: Text & Speech Processing

I narrowed it down to bio computing(farida begum), data analytics(sudeepa roy), HCI (neha sharma) for elective-I  
image processing(lakshmeesha), big data(animesh), GTA(kamatchi priya) for elective-II  
I wanted to take one easy elective to boost my cg and one for learning purposes but still not too hard.  
Can any seniors help out by pitching in with feedback on the profs and what the courses are like? 

PS: i checked rowlet-owl's post on electives but i wanted feedback mainly on profs and since its also possible for the courses to change over time.

comments.body: Can u select teachers in ec campus?
Then be informed that the assignment of teachers is random
Take AC/IoT + BD. Both are good grading wise and BD is useful.
